page.title: 02LILLINGTON MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: I go to{Lillington Middle School}which is a school for 8_12 year olds. I am in my last year of Lillington and will shortly be leaving.I will then go to Croft Hall.I enjoy school and the subjects that we learn are English, Maths,French,R.E,Music,Geography,Games History,Art,Sewing,Science,Swimming, Creative Writing,Cookery,Computer Work P.E.On Friday afternoons from 2.00 to 3.15 p.m we have options, when we can choose which activities we would like to do,from Craft and Woodwork,Chess, Gardening,Athletics,Science,Projects, Paper Sculptures and Photography.Every term we choose an option.Also, the classes take it in turns to go to the Leamington Swimming Baths. At our school we also have sports teams,such as Netball,Rounders,Cricket Table Tennis,Rugby,Football and Chess. I was a reserve for the Netball team.
